title: Add a Commit Message Template
description: When working on a project, it is important to have a consistent and informative commit message for each change made to the codebase. This helps other developers understand the purpose of the change and makes it easier to track down bugs or revert changes if necessary. In this lab, you will learn how to set up a commit message template for a Git repository.

meta.title: Set Up a Commit Message Template for Git Repositories
meta.description: Learn how to create a consistent and informative commit message template for your Git projects to improve collaboration and productivity.
